00028 #ifndef __ShaderProgramWriterManager_H__
00029 #define __ShaderProgramWriterManager_H__

00035 namespace Ogre {
00036 namespace RTShader {
00037 
00046 class _OgreRTSSExport ProgramWriterFactory : public RTShaderSystemAlloc
00047 {
00048 public:
00049     ProgramWriterFactory() {}
00050     virtual ~ProgramWriterFactory() {}
00051     
00053     virtual const String& getTargetLanguage(void) const = 0;
00054     
00056     virtual ProgramWriter* create(void) = 0;
00057 };
00058 
00059 class _OgreRTSSExport ProgramWriterManager 
00060     : public Singleton<ProgramWriterManager>, public RTShaderSystemAlloc
00061 {
00062 public:
00063     typedef map<String, ProgramWriterFactory*>::type FactoryMap;
00064 protected:
00066     FactoryMap mFactories;
00067 
00068 public:
00069     ProgramWriterManager();
00070     ~ProgramWriterManager();
00071 
00073     void addFactory(ProgramWriterFactory* factory);
00074     
00076     void removeFactory(ProgramWriterFactory* factory);
00077 
00079     bool isLanguageSupported(const String& lang);
00080 
00088     ProgramWriter* createProgramWriter( const String& language);
00089 
00105     static ProgramWriterManager& getSingleton();
00106 
00122     static ProgramWriterManager* getSingletonPtr();
